abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would assist in
            financing a four-year supervised agricultural credit project
            to improve productivity on about 2,500 medium-sized crop
            farms (10 - 50 ha.) situated in the Colombian Departments of
            Tolima and Valle.
